PerfectNetExp.abs: righthand 右方的, righthanded 右利手, righthand 右端

RelatedPhrase.word: The little girl in the righthand attic

list.key: The little girl in the righthand attic
list.abs: ...莎拉同意，由天窗进入莎拉房间抓猴子。他同时也注意到莎拉的居住环境，并且回报卡里斯福德先生。从此以后，兰达斯都会讲一些「右边阁楼少女（The little girl in the righthand attic）」的事情给卡里斯福德先生听。

rightangled fork track 直角分叉径迹righthand grip rule 右手握拳定则righthand screw rule 右手螺旋定则
right-eye image 右眼影像righthand adder 低位加法器right-hand adder 右侧数加法器

entry.def: Someone who is right-handed uses their right hand rather than their left hand for activities such as writing and sports, and for picking things up.
